article: If someone asks me "Do you like music?" I'm sure I will  _  him or her, "Of course, I do". Because I think music is an important part in our  _  .Different people have different ideas  _  music. For me, I like rock music  _  it's so exciting. And my favorite band, the "Foxy Ladies" is one of  the most famous  rock bands in the world. I also like pop music. My classmate Ann loves dance music because she enjoys  dancing  . My  best  friend, Jane, likes jazz music. She thinks jazz is  _  cool. "I like dance music and rock music very much, they are amazing," says my brother. But my sister thinks rock music is boring. "I like  relaxing  music," she says. That's  _  she likes country music, I think.
